version_description: fix bugs: processes not shown; server status not refreshed after wake from background.
fix bugs: processes not shown; server status not refreshed after wake from background.
fix bugs: processes not shown; server status not refreshed after wake from background.

New Features:
* support TouchID/FaceID protection
* support docker actions in status page
- support GPU monitor
- add TCP stats
- support import key from iCloud Drive
- add SSH logs
- add simple doctor
- auto detect all ssh keys if no key is selected when connect

Bug Fixes:
- fix can’t reconnect if connect failed
- fix RSA public key error (can’t connect using RSA key)
- fix disk IO is not updating
- fix pod’s servers are not saved

Recent Updates:

New Features:
* support TouchID/FaceID protection
* support docker actions in status page
- support GPU monitor
- add TCP stats
- support import key from iCloud Drive
- add SSH logs
- add simple doctor
- auto detect all ssh keys if no key is selected when connect

Bug Fixes:
- fix can’t reconnect if connect failed
- fix RSA public key error (can’t connect using RSA key)
- fix disk IO is not updating
- fix pod’s servers are not saved
Fix UI issue and potential crash bug
Support Chinese and third-party input keyboard

* Support OpenWrt、Amazon Linux
* Prevent screen lock when SSH is open (you can change it in settings).
* Remember last choice of chart in status screen
* Fix "Import from iCloud Drive" doesn't work if there is no key

- Support fish shell
- Network traffic/speed will aggregate all public interfaces
- Disk read/write will aggregate all blocks instead of only root block
- Compatible with more linux distro
Introduce Snippets and Batch Execution. You can save commands as snippets and run them on servers by one click or in an active terminal.

Introduce Snippets and Batch Execution. You can save commands as snippets and run them on servers by one click or in an active terminal.

- This build fixed some bugs in pods and charts
Support iOS 14

Show device’s temperature if available (tested on limited platforms, feedback is appreciated).

Fixed some potential issues.

Support text selection & copy in terminal (dismiss the keyboard and long press on the text)

Fixed some potential bugs
Fix potential crash.

Support landscape mode. 
Fix the problem that the keys on the keyboard toolbar are hard to tap.

Fixed some issues with external keyboard and docker. 
Make buttons on keyboard toolbar easier to touch.
Fixed some bugs on iPadOS 14.5
Performance improvement
Fix potential crash when execute snippets.
